# containsFragments

**Type Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether at least one movie fragment extends the asset.

## Declaration

```swift
static var containsFragments: AVAsyncProperty<Root, Bool> { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsynchronousKeyValueLoading/load(_:isolation:)] method to retrieve the property value.

For QuickTime movie files and MPEG-4 files, the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsset/canContainFragments] is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] and at least one `moof` box is present after the `moov` box.

## Loading fragment support

- **canContainFragments**: A Boolean value that indicates whether you can extend the asset by fragments.
- **overallDurationHint**: A hint to the total duration of fragments that currently exist or may exist in the future.
